data.title: Televisa
data.meta_description: Grupo Televisa (simply known as Televisa) is a Mexican telecommunications and broadcasting company, founded by Emilio Azcárraga Milmo on January 8, 1973 after the merger of Telesistema Mexicano (TSM) and Televisión Indepediente de México (TIM) respectively. Until 2022, Televisa was the largest...
